_sText:
Laserroom:
<object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/1FC2s6TyG7w&hl=en"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/1FC2s6TyG7w&hl=en" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>

History:
I played this map a long time on my own zombie server. so i could see weak points and fix em.

Features:
-64 spawns
-mapoverview/radar
-camping spots with secret access
-camping spots with automatic defend-systems
-barricade rooms
-some secrets
-fair and balanced

About the Laserroom:
U cannot control the laser-defend system manual but its possible to activade/deactivate it.
There is a trigger inside this room, which activate the laser if some one walk through.
Timing:
After triggering the doors get closed for 5 seconds, while the lasers are running through the room. (reload time) 
If the doors open again, its possible to walk through the room for 5 seconds. (chance for zombies)
>Just be sure: the red light is on!!!<

ItÂ´s also possible to dodge the lasers. (crouch for the first laser and jump for the second one)


Recommend config
-reload
-zombie knockback 2-3
-zombie HP 3000-4000

please assess/rate
